<h1 align="center">
Web DEV Course with GatsbyJS
</h1>

A ready to use template, built with GatsbyJS, styled-components and Framer Motion.

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone the repo**

    ```shell
    git clone https://github.com/demic-dev/web-dev-course-gatsbyjs
    ```

2.  **Start developing**

    Navigate into template directory.

    ```shell
    cd web-dev-course-gatsbyjs/
    gatsby develop
    ```

3.  **Enjoy! (or edit)**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!


**Feel free to use the website for your project!**
